DOC.brief_title: A Study Of GW406381 In Volunteers With Moderate Hepatic Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy subject subject moderate hepatic impairment define ChildPugh score 79 Body weight less = 100 kg Body mass index ( BMI ) within range 19 32 32kg/m2 Exclusion criterion : Presence significant disease Use medication within 2 week prior dose , unless approve investigator GSK personnel
